name: ALERT_DISPLAY
helpText: Sets the layout of the Alert Region.

name: BODY_OVERFLOW
helpText: Determines the scroll behavior when the region contents are larger than their container.

name: BODY_PADDING
helpText: Sets the Region Body padding for the region.

name: DEFAULT_STATE
helpText: Sets the default state of the region.

name: REGION_TITLE
helpText: Sets the source of the Title Bar region's title.

name: ALERT_ICONS
helpText: Sets how icons are handled for the Alert Region.

name: TIMER
helpText: Sets the timer for when to automatically navigate to the next region within the Carousel Region.

name: ALERT_TYPE
helpText: Sets the type of alert which can be used to determine the icon, icon color, and the background color.

name: ANIMATION
helpText: Sets the animation when navigating within the Carousel Region.

name: BODY_HEIGHT
helpText: Sets the Region Body height. You can also specify a custom height by modifying the Region's CSS Classes and using the height helper classes "i-hXXX" where XXX is any increment of 10 from 100 to 800.

name: BODY_STYLE
helpText: Controls the display of the region's body container.

name: HEADER
helpText: Determines the display of the Region Header which also contains the Region Title.

name: ACCENT
helpText: Set the Region's accent. This accent corresponds to a Theme-Rollable color and sets the background of the Region's Header.

name: ALERT_TITLE
helpText: Determines how the title of the alert is displayed.

name: STYLE
helpText: Determines how the region is styled. Use the "Remove Borders" template option to remove the region's borders and shadows.

name: DISPLAY_ICON
helpText: Display the Hero Region icon.

name: ITEM_PADDING
helpText: Sets the padding around items within this region.

name: ITEM_SIZE
helpText: Sets the size of the form items within this region.

name: ITEM_WIDTH
helpText: Sets the width of the form items within this region.

name: LABEL_ALIGNMENT
helpText: Set the label text alignment for items within this region.

name: LABEL_POSITION
helpText: Sets the position of the label relative to the form item.

name: REGION_TOP_MARGIN
helpText: Set the top margin for this region.

name: REGION_BOTTOM_MARGIN
helpText: Set the bottom margin for this region.

name: REGION_LEFT_MARGIN
helpText: Set the left margin for this region.

name: REGION_RIGHT_MARGIN
helpText: Set the right margin for this region.
